Summary: Biochemical reaction from n-desmethylclozapine to desmethylclozapine glucuronide. This interaction is catalyzed by UGT1A4.

Controller: CYP1A2, CYP2C19, CYP2C9, CYP2D6, CYP2E1, CYP3A4, CYP3A5, FMO3
Summary: Biochemical reaction from clozapine to clozapine n-oxide. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP3A5, CYP2C9, CYP2D6, CYP1A2, CYP3A4, CYP2E1, CYP2C19 or FMO3.

Controller: CYP1A2, CYP2C19, CYP2D6, CYP3A4, CYP3A43, CYP3A5
Summary: Biochemical reaction from clozapine to n-desmethylclozapine. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP3A4, CYP1A2, CYP3A43, CYP3A5, CYP2C19 or CYP2D6.
Biochemical reaction from clozapine to clozapine N+ glucuronide. This interaction can be catalyzed by UGT1A4, UGT2B10, UGT1A1 or UGT1A3.
Biochemical reaction from clozapine to clozapine 5-N-glucuronide. This interaction can be catalyzed by UGT2B10, UGT1A1, UGT1A4 or UGT1A3.
Transport from clozapine to clozapine. This interaction can be catalyzed by ABCG2, ABCB1 or ABCC1.
Transport from clozapine to clozapine. This interaction can be catalyzed by SLC22A2, SLC22A3 or SLC22A1.
